description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Pf9uh67LQ85K52AF]{Cache Hacks (Su)}

The holographic artist uses their spell cache to paint the world around them with dazzling holograms and creatures that others can’t help but believe.

First Slot (6th Level):disguise self,holographic image(1st level),summon creature(1st level), orunseen servant.

Second Slot (12th Level):holographic image(2nd level or lower),invisibility,mirror image, orsummon creature(2nd level or lower).

Third Slot (18th Level):displacement,holographic image(3rd level or lower),nondetection,summon creature(3rd level or lower)
